ygData.subject: Re: Kos in your guild by killing undead if you are a gnome
ygData.msgSnippet: Manickd, which newbie area are you referring to ? If you mean the one outside of A kanon, there aren t any dwarf skeletons there. those are decaying gnome
ygData.messageBody:
Manickd, which newbie area are you referring to ? If you mean the one
outside of A'kanon, there aren't any dwarf skeletons there. those are
decaying gnome skeletons. The dwarf skeletons wander around Butcherblock.
Those I have killled many of, and with no faction message. I am still
regarded amiably by my guildmaster. Are we talking about the same skeletons
?

Macabre, gnome necromancer (Bertoxxulous server)



> Trust me dont kill Dwarf Skeletons in the new be aria. You get a faction
hit
> that has your guild name right on it. Also the Gnome skeletons are a no no
> as well. You also my find trouble if you start fighting clock work in the
> field. You will become kos in parts of your town as well. I KNOW TRUST
> ME!!!!!!!!! and as far as I know so far there is now way to fix that
faction
> fit.
>
